item.title: Mailing
item.description: INTRODUCTION Mailing was released as the third box of HTB’s Season 5, Anomalies. The box is initially about a mail server (although that ceases to be important after a foothold is achieved). To gain a foothold, you need to make some major assumptions using a “guess and check” procedure that is not easily automated. The foothold is possible by means of exploiting a CVE for an application that you can’t be sure is even running on the target.
